name: In the Court of the Yellow King
name_original: In the Court of the Yellow King
description:
Trailer | Vimeo Mirror

The mansion calls to you. The King in Yellow promises much, but only if you can keep your end of the bargain.

Official Page: etkworks.com/yellowking

Fight through the mansion grounds with your cane sword and six shooter. Find the five missing artifacts, and place them upon the altar. You only have so much time to complete your task.

__________________________________________

A Lovecraftian, time-limited, and gloriously bloody metroidvania platformer. Made by a four man team in 48 hours.

http://etkworks.com/

http://etkworks.itch.io/

@etkworks
